text: vyabhicāravesagida strī mattu vyabhicāravesagida puruṣa – avaralli pratiyobbarigū talā nūru chaḍi ēṭugaḷannu hoḍeyiri. Nīvu allāhanalli hāgū paralōkadalli nambike uḷḷavarāgiddare, avara mēlina sahānubhūtiyu allāhana dharmada viṣayadalli nim'mannu taḍeyadirali mattu avara śikṣeyannu viśvāsigaḷa ondu gumpu nōḍali
